city: Charlotte Amalie-Cyril E. King (ex Harry S. Truman)
circumstances: While approaching Charlotte Amalie by night while on a cargo flight from Christiansted, the twin engine airplane went out of control and crashed into the sea. SAR operations were conducted but eventually suspended few days later a no trace of the aircraft nor the crew was found.
probable_cause: Due to lack of evidences as the wreckage was not found, the exact cause of the accident could not be determined.
